mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((c for c in s if c.isalpha()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s != s[::-1]

mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in s if c.isalpha()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((c for c in s if c.isalpha()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::+1]

    return s == s[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((c for c in s if c.isalpha()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::--1]
